snippet.title: Kitori Academy - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Support Kitori Academy on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/kitori-academy/kitori-academy-a-magical-life-sim-of-a-wizard-apprentice

Kitori Academy is a cosy life simulator where you live the adventures of a wizard apprentice with your spirit companion. 

Spend joyful days on whimsical story-quests, mixing potions, casting spells, crafting, chilling with your cat and tending your garden.

You can add Kitori Academy to your wishlist: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1340380

Website       ►  http://www.kitoriacademy​.com/
Twitter         ►  https://twitter.com/KitoriAcademy
Discord        ► https://discord.gg/JunXh9C​
Become a Patreon  ► https://www.patreon.com/kitoriacademy

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music by Ethan Duys (aka Failpositive)
https://failpositive.com/
